concept.title: IEC 61850 WxW List

othermeta.name: shortdesc
othermeta.content: Listing of WxW communication nodes and IEC 61850 mapping for plant integration and telemetry.

conbody.p: The default logical device (LD) for all IEC tags for WxW is V1_XXW_1_LD1.

The IEC tag path format is LN$FC$DO$DA.
Logical node (LN)
Functional constraint (FC)
Data object (DO)
Data attribute (DA)
conbody.note: Depending on the system type and design, some values might not be available.

section.title: Digital Values
section.p: Data format: BooleanExept for the IEC path LLN0$ST$Mod$stVal which is integer..

entry.ph: Status of the Modbus communication between the NMC and the HU250 (1 = OK, 3 = Interrupted).
